resources.string: \u0020\u0020\u0020\u0020\u0020\u0020\u0020\u0020\u0020\u0020\u0020\u0020 Welcome to this game.\n Every cell in the game represents a number between 0-35,so enter in a value between those numbers. You need to have 4 consecutive discs to win and you can win in any direction: Vertically, Horizontally or Diagonally.\n ----Enter in your username below and click start
Please enter a valid name to proceed
